name: Word Legend Hexa - Block Puzzles
description:
Addicted to brain teasers? Looking for words crush puzzles? Wanna elevate your brain power? Word Legend Hexa will fit for you! Similar with crossword, it's simple at first but will get difficult as you level up. Merged with classic word game but with alphabet on hexagons, it will give you endless fun. Crack the hexas and unblock the levels, it will take you through the word trek and make you a real word whiz!

 5 reasons you should get Word Legend Hexa:
- WONDER game to swipe hidden words on the letter grid;
- BRAIN TRAINING game to elevate and peak your mind power;
- SIMPLE word game even for little kids learning abc;
- FAMILY feud trivia game to bring you lots of fun;
- IDLE game to play with your chums and friends.
